metadata.Name: POLYGLOT-NER
metadata.Description: POLYGLOT-NER is a massive multilingual named entity recognition dataset covering 159 languages.
metadata.Paper Title: POLYGLOT-NER: Massive Multilingual Named Entity Recognition
metadata.Abstract: Named entity recognition (NER) is a fundamental task in natural language processing (NLP). Existing NER datasets are often limited in terms of language coverage and scale. To address these limitations, we introduce POLYGLOT-NER, a massive multilingual NER dataset covering 159 languages. POLYGLOT-NER is constructed by automatically translating and back-translating a high-quality English NER dataset, resulting in a diverse and large-scale dataset. We evaluate several state-of-the-art multilingual NER models on POLYGLOT-NER and demonstrate that our dataset can significantly improve the performance of these models. We also analyze the characteristics of POLYGLOT-NER and provide insights into the challenges of multilingual NER. The dataset and code are publicly available at https://github.com/microsoft/Polyglot-NER.
